cytoscape.editor.actions
Class EdgeAction

java.lang.Object
  cytoscape.editor.actions.EdgeAction
public class EdgeAction
extends java.lang.Object

action assigned to Connect button on toolbar in CytoscapeEditor sets cursor to "edge cursor" and sets editor's mode to "CONNECT_MODE"

Version:
1.0
Author:
Allan Kuchinsky, Agilent Technologies
